title: Immigrant and Refugee Health | Canadian Paediatric Society
author: Canadian Paediatric Society
description: Canadian Paediatric Society: Protecting and promoting the health and well-being of children and youth.
cleaned_text: A home for paediatricians. A voice for children and youth. Immigrant and Refugee Health Canada has one of the highest rates of immigration in the world, and a significant number of these newcomers are children and youth. Children and youth new to Canada do not enjoy the same sustained high standard of health as their Canadian-born peers. Health and well-being are critical to success in life, and to one's ability to contribute to society. Caring for Kids New to Canada: Paediatricians and family physicians and other health care providers across Canada care for immigrant and refugee children and youth every day. This website for health professionals includes information and resources to enhance patient care. A useful starting point is this collection of some of the site's key resources.
